examples.description: creates a bears table with an id as a primary key
examples.full_description: creating bears table creates a bears table with an id as a primary key
populating the bears table has 8 bears
populating the bears table has an unnamed bear

examples.description: selects all of the female bears and returns their name and age
examples.full_description: querying the bears table selects all of the female bears and returns their name and age

examples.description: selects all of the bears names and orders them in alphabetical order
examples.full_description: querying the bears table selects all of the bears names and orders them in alphabetical order

examples.description: selects all of the bears names and ages that are alive and order them from youngest to oldest
examples.full_description: querying the bears table selects all of the bears names and ages that are alive and order them from youngest to oldest

examples.description: selects the oldest bear and returns their name and age
examples.full_description: querying the bears table selects the oldest bear and returns their name and age

examples.description: selects the youngest bear and returns their name and age
examples.full_description: querying the bears table selects the youngest bear and returns their name and age

examples.description: selects the most prominent color and returns it with its count
examples.full_description: querying the bears table selects the most prominent color and returns it with its count

examples.description: counts the number of bears with goofy temperaments
examples.full_description: querying the bears table counts the number of bears with goofy temperaments
